title: Common GitHub tasks to edit angular.io
contents:
mode_edit

編輯 angular.io 的通用 GitHub 任務link

Common GitHub tasks to edit angular.iolink

這些是你在編輯 Angular 文件時執行的一些常見的 git 任務。

These are some of the common git tasks that you perform while editing Angular documentation.

本主題中的過程假定本地計算機上的檔案的組織方式如下圖所示。

The procedures in this topic assume that the files on your local computer are organized as illustrated in the following diagram.

IMPORTANT:
Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username in the commands and examples in this topic.

  • 這些過程假定你的工作目錄位於單個 workspace 目錄中，以便

    The procedures assume that your working directories are in a single workspace directory such that

    • 上游儲存庫的本地 working 目錄 angular/angular 在 workspace 目錄的 angular 子目錄的 angular 子目錄中

      The local working directory of the upstream repo, angular/angular is in the angular subdirectory of the angular subdirectory of the workspace directory

    • 原始儲存庫的本地 working 目錄 personal/angular 在 workspace 目錄的 personal 子目錄的 angular 子目錄中

      The local working directory of the origin repo, personal/angular is in the angular subdirectory of the personal subdirectory of the workspace directory

  • 這些過程假定你是從 workspace 目錄啟動

    The procedures assume that you are starting from your workspace directory

更新你的上游儲存庫的複製link

Update your clone of the upstream repolink

上游儲存函式庫是 angular/angular 儲存庫。隨著它的更新，例如透過合併 Pull Request，你的複製會落後。為了使你的 angular/angular 複製保持最新，你要每天遵循此過程。

The upstream repo is the angular/angular repo. As it is updated, such as by merging pull requests, your clone falls behind. To keep your clone of angular/angular up-to-date, you want to follow this procedure daily.

此過程會更新你在本地計算機上對 angular/angular 儲存庫的複製，以便它具有當前程式碼，如此處所示。帶圓圈的數字對應於程式步驟。

This procedure updates your clone of the angular/angular repo on your local computer so it has the current code, as illustrated here. The circled number correspond to the procedure step.

更新你的上游儲存庫的複製link

To update your clone of the upstream repolink

  1. 從你的 workspace 目錄，導航到上游儲存庫的 working 目錄。

    From your workspace directory, navigate to the working directory of the upstream repo.

    cd angular/angular

  2. 檢視 main 分支。

    Check out the main branch.

    git checkout main

  3. 使用上游 angular/angular 儲存庫中的任何更改來更新本地計算機 working 目錄中的 main 分支。

    Update the main branch in the working directory on your local computer with any changes in the upstream angular/angular repo.

    git pull

本地計算機上複製的 main 分支和 github.com 上的上游儲存庫現在已同步。現在也是更新你的 fork 的好時機。

The main branch of the clone on your local computer and the upstream repo on github.com are now in sync. Now would be a good time to update your fork as well.

使用上游儲存庫更新你的 forklink

Update your fork with the upstream repolink

你要至少每天將 fork 的 main 分支與上游的 angular/angular 儲存庫的 main 分支同步。這是在每一天開始時做的好事。在更新上游儲存庫的複製之後、開始處理 Angular 文件之前，同步你的 fork。

You want to sync the main branch of your fork with the main branch of the upstream, angular/angular repo at least daily. This is good thing to do at the beginning of each day. Sync your fork after you update your clone of the upstream repo and before you start working on the Angular documentation.

此過程會更新你本地計算機上 angular/angular 儲存庫的fork，以便它具有當前程式碼，如此處所示。帶圓圈的數字對應於過程步驟。

This procedure updates your fork of the angular/angular repo on your local computer so it has the current code, as illustrated here. The circled numbers correspond to procedure steps.

使用上游儲存庫更新你的 forklink

To update your fork with the upstream repolink

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，導航到你的工作目錄。

    From your workspace directory, navigate to your working directory.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 檢視 main 分支。

    Check out the main branch.

    git checkout main

  3. 從上游 angular/angular 儲存庫更新本地計算機 working 目錄中的 main 分支。

    Update the main branch in the working directory on your local computer from the upstream angular/angular repo.

    git fetch upstream git merge upstream/main

  4. 使用上游 angular/angular 儲存庫中的最新內容更新你在 github.com 上的 personal/angular 儲存庫。

    Update your personal/angular repo on github.com with the latest from the upstream angular/angular repo.

    git push

你本地計算機上的 main 分支和你在 github.com 上的原始儲存庫現在已同步。自你上次更新 fork 以來，對上游 angular/angular 儲存庫所做的任何更改都對它們進行了更新。

The main branch on your local computer and your origin repo on github.com are now in sync. They have been updated with any changes to the upstream angular/angular repo that were made since the last time you updated your fork.

建立工作分支進行編輯link

Create a working branch for editinglink

幾乎你對 Angular 文件的所有編輯都已完成：

Almost all your editing on the Angular documentation is done:

  • 在你的 angular/angular 的 fork 的複製中，而不是在你的 angular/angular 的複製中

    In the clone of your fork of angular/angular, not in your clone of angular/angular

  • 在從 main 分支建立的 working 或 feature 分支中

    In a working or feature branch made from the main branch

如果這不清楚，請參閱有關分支的更多資訊。

If this isn't clear, see More about branches.

在開始編輯 Angular 文件之前，你要：

Before you start editing the Angular documentation, you want to:

  1. 更新 angular/angular 的複製。

    Update your clone of angular/angular.

  2. 更新你的 angular/angular 分支。

    Update your fork of angular/angular.

  3. 從 main 分支建立一個工作分支。

    Create a working branch from the main branch.

工作分支為你提供了一種方式來追蹤你對 Angular 文件所做的更改。你還需要一個單獨的分支來在 Pull Request 中提交這些更改。建立工作分支還會將你對一個更新的更改與另一個更新分開。

A working branch gives you a way to keep track of the changes that you make to the Angular documentation. You also need a separate branch to submit those changes in a pull request. Creating a working branch also keeps your changes for one update separate from those of another.

NOTE:
Before you edit Angular documentation, make sure that you are using the correct working branch. You can confirm your current branch by running git status from your working directory before you start editing.

建立 working 分支進行編輯link

To create a working branch for editinglink

  1. 更新 angular/angular 的複製。

    Update your clone of angular/angular.

  2. 更新你的 angular/angular 分支。

    Update your fork of angular/angular.

  3. 從你的 workspace 目錄，導航到你的 working 目錄。

    From your workspace directory, navigate to your working directory.

    cd personal/angular

  4. 檢視 main 分支。

    Check out the main branch.

    git checkout main

  5. 建立你的新分支。將 new-branch 替換為新分支的名稱。

    Create your new branch. Replace new-branch with the name of your new branch.

    將分支命名為與你的編輯任務相關的內容，例如，如果你要解決 issue #12345，你可以將分支命名為 issue-12345。如果你正在改進錯誤訊息，你可以將其命名為 error-message-improvements。分支名稱可以有字母數字字元、連字元、下劃線和斜線，但不能有任何空格或其他特殊字元。

    Name the branch something that relates to your editing task, for example, if you are resolving issue #12345, you might name the branch, issue-12345. If you are improving error messages, you might name it, error-message-improvements. A branch name can have alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and slashes, but it can't have any spaces or other special characters.

    git checkout -b new-branch

  6. 將新分支推送到你在 github.com 上的儲存庫，以便你在雲端擁有它的副本。請記住將 new-branch 替換為新分支的名稱。

    Push the new branch to your repo on github.com so you have a copy of it in the cloud. Remember to replace new-branch with the name of your new branch.

    git push --set-upstream origin new-branch

儲存你的更改link

Save your changeslink

本節介紹如何儲存你對 Angular 儲存庫的 fork 工作目錄中的檔案所做的更改。如果你是使用 git 和 GitHub 的新手，請仔細檢視本節，以瞭解如何在進行更改時儲存更改。

This section describes how to save the changes you make to files in the working directory of your fork of the Angular repo. If you are new to using git and GitHub, review this section carefully to understand how to save your changes as you make them.

當你對 Angular 儲存庫的 fork 工作目錄中的檔案進行更改時，你的更改可以是：

As you make changes to files in the working directory of your fork of the Angular repo, your changes can be:

  • 已建立，但未儲存

    Made but not saved

    這是你在整合開發環境（IDE）中編輯檔案時所做的更改的狀態。這是你在 IDE 中進行更改時的狀態。

    This is the state of your changes as you edit a file in your integrated development environment (IDE). This is the state of your changes as you're making them in your IDE.

  • 已儲存，但未提交

    Saved but not committed

    從 IDE 儲存對檔案的更改後，它們會儲存到你的本地計算機。雖然更改已儲存，但它們並沒有被版本控制軟體 git 記錄為更改。當你檢視正在進行的工作時，你的檔案通常處於此狀態。

    After you save changes to a file from the IDE, they are saved to your local computer. While the changes have been saved, they have not been recorded as a change by git, the version control software. Your files are typically in this state as you review your work in progress.

  • 已提交，但未推送

    Committed but not pushed

    將更改提交到 git 後，你的更改會記錄為本地計算機上的提交，但它們不會儲存在雲端。這是你達到里程碑並在本地儲存進度時檔案的狀態。

    After you commit your changes to git, your changes are recorded as a commit on your local computer, but they are not saved in the cloud. This is the state of your files when you've reached a milestone and save your progress locally.

  • 承諾並推動

    Committed and pushed

    在你將提交推送到 github.com 中的個人儲存庫後，你的更改已被 git 記錄並儲存到雲端。它們還不是 angular/angular 儲存庫的一部分。這是你的檔案需要處於的狀態，然後你可以開啟 Pull Request 以使其成為 angular/angular 儲存庫的一部分。

    After you push your commits to your personal repo in github.com, your changes have been recorded by git and saved to the cloud. They are not yet part of the angular/angular repo. This is the state your files need to be in before you can open a pull request for it to become part of the angular/angular repo.

  • 合併到 Angular

    Merged into Angular

    在你的 Pull Request 被批准併合並後，你所做的更改現在是 angular/angular 儲存庫的一部分。

    After your pull request is approved and merged, the changes you made are now part of the angular/angular repo.

將更改儲存到本地計算機link

Save your changes to your local computerlink

如何儲存對本地計算機上檔案的更改由你的 IDE 確定。有關儲存更改的具體過程，請參閱你的 IDE。

How to save changes to a file on your local computer is determined by your IDE. Refer to your IDE for the specific procedure of saving changes.

在本地計算機上提交你的更改link

Commit your changes on your local computerlink

在本地計算機上儲存更改並準備好將更改提交到本地計算機上的 git 後，請按照此過程進行操作。

Follow this procedure after you save changes on your local computer and you are ready to commit changes to git on your local computer.

在本地計算機上提交你的更改link

To commit your changes on your local computerlink

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，導航到你的工作目錄。

    From your workspace directory, navigate to your working directory.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 確認你使用了正確的分支。如果你不在正確的分支中，請執行 git checkout branch-name 以選擇正確的分支。

    Confirm you are using the correct branch. If you aren't in the correct branch, run git checkout branch-name to select the correct branch.

    git status

  3. 檢視要新增到提交的檔案列表是否正確。

    Review the list of files to add to the commit is correct.

    git status

  4. 新增你要提交的檔案。

    Add the files you want to commit.

    git add filename

    你可以透過在 filename 引數中使用萬用字元來在單個命令中新增多個檔案。如此範例所示，你還可以用 --all 選項將 git 已經追蹤的所有更改檔案新增到提交中。

    You can add multiple files in a single command by using wildcard characters in the filename parameter. You can also add all changed files that are already being tracked by git to the commit by using --all option as this example shows.

    git add --all

  5. 將更改提交到本地計算機。將 detailed-commit-comment 替換為描述你所做更改的特定註釋。

    Commit the changes to the local computer. Replace detailed-commit-comment with a specific comment that describes the changes you made.

    git commit -m 'docs: detailed-commit-comment'

將你的更改推送到雲中的 GitHub 帳戶link

Push your changes to your GitHub account in the cloudlink

在你提交對本地計算機的更改後，此過程會將你的提交儲存到雲中的 GitHub 帳戶。

After you have committed changes to your local computer, this procedure saves your commits to your GitHub account in the cloud.

將你的更改推送到雲中的 GitHub 帳戶link

To push your changes to your GitHub account in the cloudlink

  1. 從你的 workspace 目錄，導航到你的 working 目錄。

    From your workspace directory, navigate to your working directory.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 確認你使用了正確的分支。如果你不在正確的分支中，請執行 git checkout branch-name 以選擇正確的分支。

    Confirm you are using the correct branch. If you aren't in the correct branch, run git checkout branch-name to select the correct branch.

    git status

  3. 將本地計算機上的提交推送到你在雲中的 GitHub 上的帳戶。

    Push the commits on your local computer to your account on GitHub in the cloud.

    git push

    如果這是你第一次從分支推送提交，你可以看到如下訊息。

    If this is the first time you've pushed commits from the branch, you can see a message such as this.

    fatal: The current branch my-new-branch has no upstream branch. To push the current branch and set the remote as upstream, use git push --set-upstream origin my-new-branch To have this happen automatically for branches without a tracking upstream, see 'push.autoSetupRemote' in 'git help config'.

    如果你收到此訊息，請複製訊息提供的命令並執行它，如下所示：

    If you get this message, copy the command that the message provides and run it as shown here:

    git push --set-upstream origin my-new-branch

開啟 Pull Request 以將更改合併為 angular/angularlink

Open pull requests to merge a change into angular/angularlink

有關準備更改以開啟 Pull Request 的資訊，請參閱為 Pull Request 準備文件。

For information about preparing your changes to open a pull request, see Preparing documentation for a pull request.

使你的分支保持最新link

Keep your branch up-to-datelink

如果你對文件的更改需要一天以上的時間，則 angular/angular 儲存庫可以在你編輯時更改。在合併更改之前，必須在當前程式碼之上進行。在進行所有更改之後、開啟 Pull Request 之前，你必須更新你的工作分支。你可能還希望在編輯時保持工作分支更新。無論哪種方式，更新分支的過程都是相同的。

If your changes to the documentation take more than a day, the angular/angular repo can change while you're editing. Before you can merge your changes, they must be made on top of the current code. You must update your working branch after you've made all your changes and before you open a pull request. You might also want to keep your working branch updated as you're editing. Either way, the procedure to update your branch is the same.

使你的分支保持最新link

To keep your branch up-to-datelink

  1. 更新 angular/angular 的複製。

    Update your clone of angular/angular.

  2. 更新你的 angular/angular 分支。

    Update your fork of angular/angular.

  3. 從你的工作區目錄，導航到你的工作目錄。

    From your workspace directory, navigate to your working directory.

    cd personal/angular

  4. 確認你使用了正確的分支。如果你不在正確的分支中，請執行 git checkout branch-name 以選擇正確的分支。

    Confirm that you are using the correct branch. If you aren't in the correct branch, run git checkout branch-name to select the correct branch.

    git status

    如果你有任何未提交的更改，請在繼續之前在本地計算機上提交你的更改。

    If you have any un-commited changes, Commit your changes on your local computer before you continue.

  5. 重新定位你的分支以將分支中的更改新增到 main 分支中的當前內容。

    Rebase your branch to add the changes in your branch to the current content in the main branch.

    git rebase main

  6. 在雲中更新你的儲存庫中的分支。

    Update the branch in your repo in the cloud.

    git push --force-with-lease

有關分支的更多資訊link

More about brancheslink

git 是一個版本控制系統，可以追蹤對儲存庫中檔案所做的更改。它透過維護一個稱為 commits 的更改列表來實現。提交是自上次提交以來在儲存庫中更改的所有內容的列表。

git is a version control system that tracks the changes made to the files in a repo. It does this by maintaining a lists of changes called commits. A commit is a list of all the things that changed in a repo since the last commit.

什麼是分支link

What are brancheslink

branch 是提交的列表。main 分支是反映專案當前狀態的提交列表。

A branch is a list of commits. The main branch is the list of commits that reflects the current state of the project.

建立儲存庫時，第一次提交通常是到 main 分支，幷包含建立儲存庫中使用的檔案。該提交中的更改列表包含為建立儲存庫新增的檔案的名稱和內容。

When a repo is created, the first commit is usually to the main branch and contains the files used in the creation of the repo. The change list in that commit contains the names and the contents of the files that were added to create the repo.

下次新增或更改儲存庫中的檔案時，會建立另一個提交來描述發生的更改。

The next time files in the repo are added or changed, another commit is created to describe what has changed.

在五次提交之後，main 分支可以想象為下圖。該圖顯示了記錄為提交的一系列更改，每個更改都表示為一個圓圈並由一個唯一的數字標識。

After a five commits, the main branch can be imagined as the following diagram. The diagram shows a series of changes that are recorded as commits, each represented as a circle and identified by a unique number.

在此範例中，提交 1 到 5 中所有更改的結果是儲存庫的當前狀態。

In this example, the result of all the changes in commits one through five is the current state of the repo.

建立工作分支link

Creating a working branchlink

在 angular/angular 中，main 分支包含自 Angular 專案開始到達今天的位置以來對它所做的所有更改。main 分支中的提交列表都已經過審查和測試。

In angular/angular, the main branch contains all the changes that have been made to the Angular project since it began to get it to where it is today. The list of commits in the main branch have all been reviewed and tested.

更新文件時，你可能需要進行一些更改才能獲得你想要的內容。在你有機會測試和檢視它們之前，你不希望開啟 Pull Request 將你的更改合併到 main 中。

When you update the documentation, you might need to make several changes before have exactly what you want. You don't want to open a pull request to merge your changes into main until you have had a chance to test and review them.

為此，你建立一個要在其中工作的新 working 分支。此範例命名新的 working 分支。

To do this you create a new working branch in which to work. This example names the new working branch.

# From the working directory of your personal/angular repo git checkout main; # start from the main branch git checkout -b working; # create a new branch named "working"

working 分支從 main 分支中已經進行的所有更改開始。由此，你可以進行自己的更改。在 working 分支中進行兩次提交後，儲存庫中的分支可以想象成這個插圖。

The working branch starts with all the changes that have already been made in the main branch. From this, you can make your own changes. After making two commits in the working branch, the branches in the repo can be imagined as this illustration.

將你的工作合併到主分支link

Merging your work into the main branchlink

如果你在上一節的兩個提交中所做的更改具有你想要使用的內容。也就是說，你已經檢視並測試了這些更改。你可以開啟一個 Pull Request 以將這些新更改合併到 main 分支。

If the changes you made in the two commits from the previous section have what you want to use. That is, you have reviewed and tested those changes. You can open a pull request to merge those new changes into the main branch.

如果自建立分支以來沒有對 main 分支進行任何更改，則合併稱為 fast-forwarding。在 fast-forward 合併中，你新增到 working 分支的兩個提交會新增到 main 分支。

If no changes have been made to the main branch since you created your branch, the merge is called fast-forwarding. In a fast-forward merge the two commits you added to the working branch are added to the main branch.

在 working 分支與 main 分支合併後，main 分支現在包含你在 working 分支中所做的兩個提交。因為這兩個分支都包含提交 1-7，所以它們現在具有相同的內容。

After the working branch has been merged with the main branch, the main branch now includes the two commits you made in the working branch. Because both branches include commits 1-7, they now have the same content.

將你的工作合併到更改後的主分支link

Merging your work into a changed main branchlink

能夠 fast-foward 合併很簡單。不幸的是，在像 angular/angular 這樣有許多貢獻者的儲存庫中，主分支經常更改。這裡展示了一個更有可能的場景，其中的 main 分支在你處理 working 分支中的更改時發生了更改。產生的分支可以想象為下圖。當你處理提交 6 和 7 時，其他人也貢獻了提交 8 和 9。

Being able to fast-foward a merge is simple. Unfortunately, in a repo like angular/angular that has many contributors, the main branch is changing frequently. A more likely scenario is illustrated here, where the main branch changed while you're working on your changes in the working branch. The resulting branches could be imagined as the following illustration. While you were working on commits six and seven, others had contributed commits eight and nine.

提交 6 和 7 不能用於快進。請記住，提交是更改的列表。提交 6 是從提交 5 開始的更改列表加上你所做的第一個編輯。提交 7 是你的提交 6 中的更改列表以及你為響應審閱評論所做的更改。無論如何，來自 working 分支的提交都不能新增到主分支中的提交 9。working 分支的提交不包括來自提交 8 和 9 的更改，因此它們可能會丟失。

The commits six and seven can't be used to fast-forward. Remember that a commit is a list of changes. Commit six is the list of changes from commit five plus the first edit you made. Commit seven is the list of changes from your commit six plus the changes you made in response to your review comments. In any case, the commits from your working branch can't be added to the commit nine in the main branch. The commits from the working branch don't include the changes from commits eight and nine, so they could be lost.

你可以選擇合併兩個分支中的更改或重新定位 working 分支中的提交。合併會建立一個 merge 提交，以協調為表示兩個分支的最終結果所需的更改。雖然合併也不錯，但它很難撤消單個更改。

You cam choose to merge the changes in the two branches or to rebase the commits in your working branch. Merging creates a merge commit to reconcile the changes necessary to represent the net result of both branches. While merging isn't bad, it makes it hard to undo the individual changes.

最後複查時間：9/30/2022
